name: Mango Dungeon
description:
Mango Dungeon sets the story of a great wizard pursuing a mythic artifact, and, with your help, he ought to acquire it. 

Controls:
        Movement - w, a, s, d
        Channel attack - Mouse Button 1
        Fire attack - F

This is a game Developed for a school assignment.

Disciplina: Sistemas de informação. CETEC - UCS.
